00113 
00114 void mol_and_orb::write_pdb(string file, string name_mol, const int & n=0 ){
00115     FILE* out_qm;
00116     if(n==0){
00117        out_qm = fopen(file.c_str(), "w");
00118     }
00119     else{
00120         out_qm = fopen(file.c_str(), "a");
00121     }
00122     for (int i=0 ; i < N ;i++ ){
00123         fprintf(out_qm, "ATOM  %5d %4c %3s %1s%4d    %8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f\n", (n+i+1)%100000, (atom_labels[i]._type)[0],
00124 name_mol.c_str(), " ", (n+1)/N, RA*((atom_pos[i]).getX()), RA*((atom_pos[i]).getY()), RA*((atom_pos[i]).getZ()), 1.0, 20.0);
00125     }
00126     fclose(out_qm);
00127 }
00128 
00129 int mol_and_orb::init_charges(const char * neutrfile, const char * crgfile){
00130     _neutr = new multipoles;
00131     _crged = new multipoles;
00132     _neutr->read_crg_eps(neutrfile);
00133     _crged->read_crg_eps(crgfile);
00134     if(_neutr->mpls.size() != this->N)
00135         throw std::runtime_error("number of atoms and entries in neutral charges file does not match");
00136     if(_crged->mpls.size() != this->N)
00137         throw std::runtime_error("number of atoms and entries in charged charges file does not match");
00138     return 0;
00139 }

00141 int mol_and_orb::init(const char * nameinput){
00142         int i=0, j=0 ;
00143         // read molecule//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00144 
00145         ifstream in;
00146         in.open(nameinput);
00147         if(!in){cout << "Error, file " << nameinput << "does not exist" << endl; return 1;}
00148         string  xch,ych,zch;
00149         double x,y,z;
00150         n_el=0;
00151         centre.setX(0.);
00152         centre.setY(0.);
00153         centre.setZ(0.);
00154         
00155         string word;
00156         
00157         vec pos;
00158         
00159         int lbl;
00160         string type;
00161         char chtype;
00162         atom_type a_type;
00163 
00164         while ( in >> word){
00165 
00166                 if(i%4==0){
00167                     if (word[0] != '#' ) {
00168                         type= word;
00169                         chtype= word[0];
00170                     }
00171                     else {getline(in, word); i--;}
00172                 }
00173               
00174                 else if (i%4==1) xch = word;
00175                 else if (i%4==2) ych = word;
00176                 else if (i%4==3) {
00177                         zch = word;
00178                         /*read the atom type*/
00179                         map<string, int>::iterator itp = periodic_table.find(type);
00180                         if (itp != periodic_table.end() ){
00181                             lbl = itp->second;
00182                             n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00183                         }
00184                         else {
00185                             throw runtime_error(string("Bad atom type, "));
00186                         }
00187                         /*switch (chtype ){
00188                         
00189                         //set up labls, basis set ///////////////////////////////
00190                             case 'C': {  // definition of notation used:
00191                                 lbl = (5);
00192                                 n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00193                                 break;
00194                                       }
00195                             case 'N': {
00196                                 lbl = ( 6);
00197                                 n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00198                                 break;
00199                         
00200                                       }
00201                             case 'O': {
00202                                 lbl = (7);
00203                                 n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00204                                 break;
00205                                       }
00206                             case 'A': {  
00207                                 lbl = (12);
00208                                 n_el = _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00209                                 break;
00210                                       }
00211                             case 'S': {
00212                                 lbl = (15);
00213                                 n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00214                                 break;
00215                                       }
00216                             case 'H': {
00217                                 lbl = (0);
00218                                 n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00219                                 break; 
00220                                       }
00221                             case 'B': {
00222                                 lbl = (18);
00223                                 n_el += _bs->get_nel_at(lbl);
00224                                 break; 
00225                             }
00226                             default: {
00227                                 cout << "Bad atom type, we accept only: A (Al), C, O, H, N, S (use CAPITAL letters)" << endl;
00228                                 return 1;
00229                                      }
00230                         }*/
00232                         sscanf(xch.c_str() , "%lf", &x );
00233                         sscanf(ych.c_str() , "%lf", &y );
00234                         sscanf(zch.c_str() , "%lf", &z );
00235                         pos.setX(x / RA); pos.setY(y / RA) ; pos.setZ(z/RA);
00236 
00237                         a_type._type = type;
00238                         a_type._lbl  = lbl;
00239 
00240                         atom_labels.push_back(a_type);
00241                         atom_pos.push_back(pos);
00242                         
00243                         j++;
00244                 }
00245                 i++;
00246         }
00247         N = j; 
00248 
00249 
00250         vector <vec> :: iterator iter_pos;
00251         for (iter_pos = atom_pos.begin() ;iter_pos < atom_pos.end() ; iter_pos++){
00252             centre += *iter_pos;
00253         }
00254         centre /= double(N);
00255         
00256         for (iter_pos = atom_pos.begin() ;iter_pos < atom_pos.end() ; iter_pos++){
00257             *iter_pos -= centre;
00258         }
00259         centre.setX(0.); centre.setY(0.) ; centre.setZ(0.);
00260 
00262         return 0;
00263 }
00264 
00265 int mol_and_orb::init_orbitals(orb & a, const char * namefile){
00266     vector <atom_type>:: iterator iter_at;
00267     int k=0;
00268     for (iter_at = atom_labels.begin() ; iter_at < atom_labels.end(); ++ iter_at){
00269         k += _bs->get_nbasis_at( iter_at -> _lbl) ; 
00270     }
00271     string * basis;
00272     basis = new string[k];
00273 
00274     k=0;
00275     for (iter_at = atom_labels.begin() ; iter_at < atom_labels.end(); ++ iter_at){
00276         for ( int i = 0 ; i < _bs->get_nbasis_at ( iter_at -> _lbl ) ;i++  ){
00277            basis[k] = _bs->get_basis_lbl_at(iter_at -> _lbl , i) ;
00278            k ++;
00279         }
00280     }
00281         
00282     a.init_orbitals( basis, k , namefile);
00283     orbitals = &a;
00284     delete [] basis;
00285     return 0;
00286 }
